gold.user: User wants to retrieve details about a specific authorized connect app associated with their Twilio account using the Account SID and Connect App SID.
gold.ideal: Fetch the details of the authorized connect app including its name, description, and status.

gold.user: User needs to list all authorized connect apps for their Twilio account to manage integrations and permissions.
gold.ideal: Return a list of all authorized connect apps with their respective details such as SID, name, and status.
